DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether effect pumpkin seed oil supplementation , 2 gram per day , blood pressure ( systolic diastolic ) premenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Pumpkin Seed Oil Supplementation Premenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: The research study conduct 12-week period . Overall , participant meet researcher three time . During first visit , participant sign consent form , blood pressure take digital blood pressure monitor . If systolic blood pressure great 140 mmHg diastolic blood pressure great 90 mmHg , eligible take part study . If participant able take part study , give code number protect confidentiality randomly assign one two group , Group I Group II . The participant ask state age , ethnicity , menopausal status , whether take oral contraceptive . Next , height weight take instrument call Health-O-Meter . Body mass index ( BMI ) percent body fat calculate use instrument call Body Composition Analyzer . After measurement take , participant give instruction keep 3-day diet supplement diary . A booklet provide help record diet two nonconsecutive week day one weekend day . The 3-day diet supplement diary complete week first second session researcher . During session participant ask complete food frequency questionnaire help researcher asses phytoestrogen content diet . At end first session , researcher schedule second session participant . The second session take place one week first session . During second session , measurement take height , weight , BMI , percent body fat , blood pressure . Participants ask return 3-day diet supplement diary researcher . The researcher review diary ask question clarify food record . The participant ask complete physical activity questionnaire . Next , supplement distribute . The participant knowledge group assign . Group I receive 168 capsule , capsule contain 1 gram wheat germ oil , two pill bottle . One bottle contain 100 capsule ; second bottle contain 68 capsule . Group II receive 168 capsule , capsule contain 1 gram pumpkin seed oil , two pill bottle . One bottle contain 100 capsule ; second bottle contain 68 capsule . Participants instruct take 2 capsule per day , every day 12 week . Two capsule per day equal approximately Â½ teaspoon 18 kilocalorie . It matter choose take capsule time different time day . To help remind participant take supplement day , receive 7 day pill organizer daily check list . At session , participant receive second 3-day diet supplement diary complete one week final session . At end second session , researcher schedule final session participant . The third final session take place 12 week initial session . Measurements take final session height , weight , BMI , percent body fat , blood pressure . The participant ask complete food frequency questionnaire identical questionnaire fill first session researcher . Participant ask return 3-day diet supplement diary , daily check list , pill organizer , 2 pill bottle , unused supplement . After completion study participant receive $ 20 Target gift card session . A potential risk study include loss confidentiality . Confidentiality maintain use code number rather names data containing document . Digital data analysis do use code number identifiable data . Data record paper contain identifiable non-identifiable participant information ( consent form , data collection form , 3-day diet supplement diary , physical activity questionnaire , food frequency questionnaire , participant daily checklist ) keep locked cabinet Room 10132B Texas Woman 's University , Houston Office Research . Another potential risk study may participant 's normal schedule disrupt come Texas Woman 's University , Houston campus . To minimize risk , session schedule researcher advance Monday Friday , 8 a.m. 5 p.m. accommodate participant 's schedule .
DOC.criteria: Read , speak , write English Premenopausal Consuming estrogen supplement Taking hypertensive blood pressure medication Consuming pumpkin seed oil supplement Consuming pumpkin seed month Wheat allergy gluten intolerance Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg
